foreignData.name: Zhalfirinischer Lockvogel
foreignData.text: {T}: Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls in diesem Zug eine Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel gekommen ist.

foreignData.text: {T} : Engagez la créature ciblée. N'activez cette capacité que si vous avez fait arriver une créature sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Non lasciare mai che distolgano lo sguardo da te."

name: Zhalfirin Decoy
originalText: {T}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if you had a creature enter the battlefield under your control this turn.

rulings.text: Zhalfirin Decoy’s ability can be activated even if a creature entered the battlefield under your control only before Zhalfirin Decoy entered the battlefield, and even if that creature has left the battlefield.

text: {T}: Tap target creature. Activate only if you had a creature enter the battlefield under your control this turn.
